metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9027 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library)1.5.13. There is a heap-based buffer overflow problem in the functionReadNextCell() in mat5.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9027` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.13-3
matio-tools - 1.5.13-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.13-3').
